description:
The pre-industrial control in a model with interactive ice sheet model.   
The spin up may require the GCM and ISM to be asynchronously coupled until the system reches quasi-equilibrium.  
Once equilibrium is reached, run for multi-hundred years (500 years suggested).
keywords: ISMIP6, Tier 1, piControl,  interactive ISM, interactive ice sheets
long_name: Pre-industrial control with interactive ice sheets
rationale:
To produce a realistic non-drifting coupled state, and assess systematic model bias.     
To capture unforced natural variability.

requirements.keywords: Pre-industrial forcing, excluding carbon dioxide, excluding co2
requirements.label: PIForcingExcludingCO2

requirements.description: Initialisation after the system reaches quasi-equilibrium
requirements.label: Initialisation after spin-up

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model or an Earth System Model with interactive ice sheets
requirements.keywords: AOGCM-ISM, ESM-ISM, Atmosphere-Ocean-IceSheet, Earth System, Model, Configuration
requirements.label: AOGCM-ISM Configuration
